properties.title: Changes Ingrid UDK - IGC Importer (IGC Updater)

release.action: Edit service version via syslists. Replace column t011_obj_serv_version.serv_version with version_key/_value, adding new syslists, migrating data.
Geo-Dataset/-Service: Separate namespace and resource identifier with "/" instead of "#" (t03_catalogue.cat_namespace, t011_obj_geo.datasource_uuid).
Added license header to all source files for Open Source migration.
Updated and added entries (iso) to syslists accessConstraints (List-ID 6010) + useConstraints (List-ID 6020).
Increase size of operation url (t011_obj_serv_op_connpoint.connect_point).
Profile: Fix JS in "INSPIRE Themen" so dependent fields are now adapted via call of internal JS method ("Kodierungsschema", "Konformität").
Increase size of restriction value (object_access.restriction_value).

Add columns t011_obj_serv.has_atom_download and t03_catalogue.atom_download_url for atom downloadservice implementation. Profile: Add new legacy field "Als ATOM-Download Dienst bereitstellen" (Checkbox).
Migrate "open data" from additional fields (HH) to new Open Data checkbox and categories.
Add columns t017_url_ref.datatype_key / datatype_value for datatype of url reference.
Add column t01_object.is_open_data and table object_open_data_category for open data implementation. Profile: Add new legacy fields "Open Data checkbox" + "Kategorien".
Remove duplicate Original IDs from copied objects.
Add column 'publish_id' to 't02_address' for handling publication condition of addresses.
Move address note to address comment and remove note field.
Add column 'data' to table 'sys_list' for adding data to syslist entries.
Set default value of catalog namespace if empty.
Add JS to profile to avoid null entries in Sachdaten/Attributinformationen (Klasse 1).
Increase size of URL link (t017_url_ref.url_link).
Change reference from "Geodatendienst" to "Geo-Information/Karte" to type "Gekoppelte Daten".
Added documentation and script for migrating existing IGC catalog from MySQL to Oracle.

Added new strategy 1.0.2_clean for generating initial empty catalog without passing UDK data. When catalog is created then initial strategy (1.0.2) is chosen automatically dependent from whether UDK data passed or not. Nearly all configuration parameters can be passed as command line parameters now. Now zip files can also be loaded from jars via ClassLoader.
Migrate references "Data to Service" to references "Service to Data". Only "Service to Data" references now !

Add column 'coupling_type' to table 't011_obj_serv' for coupling service to data object. Also add new legacy field 'Coupling type' to Profile including JavaScript for handling state of 'Presentational Data'.
Migrate user addresses to separate hidden addresses not visible in IGE.
Add column 'hide_address' to table 't02_address' for hiding address from search and display.
Make syslists 6010/6020 (Verfügbarkeit-Zugangsbeschränkungen/-Nutzungsbedingungen) maintainable, not part of syslist repo.

Update all strategies to read codelist values direct from IGC database instead of serialized codelists (removed because of new codelist repo). Change lang_id of sys_list to VARCHAR(255) to store specific InGrid codes. Update syslists in catalog from file to match repo, also writes NEW "languages" (iso, req_value).
Remove default entries from syslist 510 "Zeichensatz des Datensatzes", initial value now empty.
Move "Geodatendienst - Operationen" before "Erstellungsmaßstab", now always visible, check table before publish (Profile). Add new syslist (5180) for operation platforms.
Rework "Add/Edit Link" dialog: remove columns from t017_url_ref, remove syslist 2240 (url datatype), add entries to syslist 2000 (link type).
Rework and migration of syslist 505 (RESPONSIBLE PARTY ROLE) according to INSPIRE Metadata Regulation Nr 1205/2008.

Add new control "Datensammlung/Datenbank - Fachbezug - Objektartenkatalog" with new database table, also replacing table of "Geoinformation/Karte - Schlüsselkatalog". Move field "Geoinformation/Karte - Fachbezug - Sachdaten/Attributinformation" next to "Schlüsselkatalog", on Input make "Schlüsselkatalog" mandatory (Profile).

Move fields from "Fachbezug" to rubric "Datenqualität" (Profile) and migrate data from DQ tables. Remove according DQ tables/data/syslists. Handle visibility of rubric "Datenqualität" via JS in first control (Profile).
Update behaviour of "ISO-Themenkategorie" and "INSPIRE-Thema"/"INSPIRE-relevanter Datensatz" in Profile. Change positions.
Update behaviour of "Sprache der Ressource" and "Zeichensatz des Datensatzes" in Profile.

"Spezifikation der Konformität" and "Nutzungsbedingungen" now have new syslists (6005, 6020), also allowing free entries. Syslist entries 6005 contain publication date at end of value, not shown in IGE but used in IDF mapping. "Nutzungsbedingungen" changed from table to textarea with separate dialog for selection from syslist. Add Javascript to profile for "INSPIRE-Themen" adapting content of "Kodierungsschema der geographischen Daten" (only class 1).
Changed syslist.name + .description to datatype TEXT to support syslist entries containing longer text (e.g. multiple lines from textarea like "Nutzungsbedingungen").
Add column "Namespace" to catalogue table used for namespace of MD_Identifier/code ("Identifikator der Datenquelle").
Remove environmental categories from catalog (t0114_env_category + syslist 1400 + legacy control in profile). Categorization now only via environmental topics.
Change "Feldname/Bezeichnung der Verweisbeziehung*" of URL to VARCHAR 255.
Change several IGC columns from VARCHAR 255 to TEXT (VARCHAR 4000 on Oracle).
Fixed compatibility with MySQL 5.5 (changed syntax of InnoDB when creating tables).

release.description: Add-Ons + Bugfixes for InGrid 3.0. New IGC Schema 3.0.1
release.action: Increased length of Project Participants and Project Manager of object of class "Project" in database.
Increased length of organisation name of address in database.
Spatial reference system ("Raumbezugssystem") is now 1:n association, added new database table spatial_system and migration of data.
Fix error when migrating additional fields to IGC profile, now also handles special characters in field labels, lists etc.
Allow free entries in "Höhe Vertikaldatum" (migrate t01_object.vertical_extent_vdatum to vertical_extent_vdatum_key / value).
Fix Codelist 510 (ISO MD_CharacterSetCode), add all ISO entries.
Migrate data of "Erfassungsgrad" from CompletenessCommission to CompletenessOmission, is now "Datendefizit".
Adding checkbox "INSPIRE relevant" to object class 1 and 3, removing "NO Inspire Theme" from theme list.
Flexible data model: Migrate IGC to default profile and migrate t08* additional fields (definition and data).

release.description: Bugfix Release InGrid 2.3.1. New IGC Schema 2.3.1.1
release.action: Fix permission in database for writing subnodes -> rename permission to 'write-subnode' (IGC Schema 2.3.1.1).

release.description: Release InGrid 2.3 static changes. New IGC Schema 2.3.0 (INSPIRE editor) OR 2.3.1 (additional user groups + permission), ENFORCES UPDATE OF IGE iPlug !
release.action: InGrid 2.3 NI: Add new permission write-subtree which gives permission to create entities but not to change the original entity (IGC Schema 2.3.1).
InGrid 2.3 NI: Introduce MULTIPLE GROUPS per User (IGC Schema 2.3.1).
InGrid 2.3: Introduce input of INSPIRE Encoding (data format) (IGC Schema 2.3.0).
InGrid 2.3: Introduce Data Quality input for "Geoinformation/Karte" (IGC Schema 2.3.0).
InGrid 2.3: Split object class "Dienst/Anwendung/Informationssystem" into classes "Geodatendienst" and "Informationssystem/Dienst/Anwendung" (IGC Schema 1.0.9).
InGrid 2.3: Separate "Access Constraints" and "Usage Limitations" into different tables (Trennung "Zugangsbeschränkungen" / "Nutzungsbedingungen") (IGC Schema 1.0.8).

release.description: Oracle support added. NOTICE: New IGC Schema Version 1.0.7 ENFORCES UPDATE OF IGE iPlug !
release.action: Oracle support added (in all Strategies + new Strategy 1.0.7) -> New IGC Schema Version 1.0.7 ENFORCES UPDATE OF IGE iPlug !
Added strategy for fixing INSPIRE and other syslists (1.0.6_fixSyslistInspire). Can be called on its own (independent from other strategies).
Added RLP specific syslist data (csv) + Delete script for global syslist data (see directory syslist_import).
Strategy 1.0.6: Dienst -> Fachbezug -> Basisdaten auf Type TEXT geändert (Textarea in IGE)
Strategy 1.0.6: Erweiterung aller VARCHAR Felder auf 255 (um Längen-Probleme beim Speichern zu vermeiden)
Installer: Email des Katalog-Administrators hat jetzt Default Wert
Strategy 1.0.5_fixCountryCodelist hinzugefügt: aktualisiert Länder-Sysliste auf ALLE Länder gemäß ISO-3166-1 (optional ausführbar)
Installationsassistent und Maven2 Kompatibilität
Strategy 1.0.6 hinzugefügt: erhöht Länge von Datenbankfeld t01_object.dataset_alternate_name
erste Distribution: migriert/updated auf IGC Datenkatalog Version 1.0.5 (Basis für IGE-iPlug Version 1.2.0)
